short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: LoL Pulse provides a convenient dashboard for League of Legends esports information.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a fast dashboard for viewing all leagues available on lolesports.com, as well as scheduling alarms to make sure you don't miss any games!
